content: Kwik Bolt 3 Wedge anchor HDG High-performance wedge anchor with everyday approvals for uncracked concrete (hot-dip galvanized) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Approved by ICC-ES for concrete Rounded end for easy installation Dog point impact section to prevent thread damage during installation Testing according to AC193 results in smallest edge distance and spacing for all wedge anchors in class Also available in carbon steel, 304 SS and 316 SS Applications Fastening structural steel Attaching low exposure hand rails and signs Attaching low exposure seating and bleachers Fastening industrial/mechanical equipment ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, HDG (Hot-Dip Galvanized)/Sherardized Head configuration: Externally threaded Approvals / Test reports: ICC-ES report (concrete) Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, HDG (Hot-Dip Galvanized)/Sherardized | Head configuration | Externally threaded | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete) | Base materials | Concrete (lightweight), Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (grout-filled CMU) | Type of fixing | Pre-fastening, Through-fastening | Installation tools | TE 6-22 Cordless rotary hammer, SIW 4AT-22 ½” Cordless impact wrench | PROFIS Software | Yes | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor with temporary condensation ### ITEMS- 378083 -
